alert.note: Alert for Boyd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 04 at 12:22AM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of northeast Kentucky, southeast Ohio, and West Virginia, including the following areas, in northeast Kentucky, Boyd and Lawrence KY. In southeast Ohio, Athens, Gallia, Lawrence OH, Meigs, and Washington. In West Virginia, Cabell, Doddridge, Mason, Pleasants, Putnam, Ritchie, Tyler, and Wood. * Until 1 AM EST early this morning * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, larger creeks, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
